metadata.title: CVE-2023-49342 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Temporary data passed between application components by Budgie ExtrasClockworks applet could potentially be viewed or manipulated. The data isstored in a location that is accessible to any user who has local access tothe system. Attackers may pre-create and control this file to present falseinformation to users or deny access to the application and panel.

criterions.comment: budgie-extras: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
